name: You are Nothing.
description:
My entry for the LM0B Beginners Game Jam #14 with the theme "Nothing".

I overshot a little and didn't get everything I'd like to have finished, done. I'm still fairly happy with what came out of this and learned a lot! I hope you enjoy my little game :)

Mostly made my own sounds but used content from:

Boss door closing - "Door, Wooden, Close, A (H1).wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

Boss door opening - "Door, Front, Opening, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

Ending door closing - "unlocking metal door" by soundmary, https://freesound.org/people/soundmary/sounds/194989/

Background Music - "INTO THE HAUNTED FOREST" by Eric Matyas,https://soundimage.org/

Used Materials off the Unity store:

PBR Materials - Wood & Metal by Adam Bielecki

Stylized Roof Material by Casual2d

Free architectural textures by CrazyTextures

Hand Painted Stone Texture by LowlyPoly

Yughues Free Ground Materials by Nobiax/Yughues
